content: these sweet little hearts are knitted flat in one piece - with a seam down the centre back they are quick and easy to knit many nhs hospitals welcome these little hearts - knitted in pairs one to stay with a patient and the other for a family member to keep them connected in their thoughts i didn t invent this way of knitting a heart - many have been knitted and donated since covid times - but this is my easy version each little heart measures around 3 8cm requirements dk yarn 3 25mm / 3 5mm / 3 75mm knitting needles polyester stuffing so sweet **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
